reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Smith's lectures are engaging and insightful. He explains complex topics clearly.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Doe is a knowledgeable professor, but her assignments are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: The course material is tough, but Dr. Brown provides good support outside of class.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is fantastic! Her labs are well-organized and her teaching is excellent.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are dry and hard to follow, but the textbook is helpful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is passionate about literature and makes the class enjoyable.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Miller is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is an amazing professor who genuinely cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson challenges you to think deeply and critically about the material.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is friendly and approachable, but the course content is a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is well-versed in political theory and encourages open discussion.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Clark has a great teaching style and makes economics accessible to everyone.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is passionate about art, but his lectures could be more interactive.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Perez is very knowledgeable and her classes are both informative and engaging.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. White's lectures are difficult to understand and the assignments are very tough.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson is an excellent lecturer who brings the subject to life.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's classes are challenging, but he provides a lot of support and resources.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Young is knowledgeable, but her teaching style is a bit hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson provides great real-world examples and keeps the class interesting.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia is a brilliant musician and an inspiring teacher. Highly recommend her class!
